title: I received an email from support but I never contacted them.
content:
I received an email from Google today that looks legit asking me for system logs.

I did not contact support about this issue, but I have commented on the problem in these forums, and I am experiencing the issue as described in the bottom of the message from support.

I can see that the message is 3 parts cut and pasted together.
Top part is hello I understand your issue.
Middle part is how to create and attach log.
Bottom part explains how the feature is supposed to work...

The problem is that the top part explains a different problem that I don't have on a P5 which I do not own.

I replied back explaining this and the rep said sorry top but was a typo, which is understandable due to cut and paste...

Still seems slightly fishy to me, and I am wondering if one of you could look up the case ID number and/or confirm the email address that I was given to see if this is legit or not as I would love to help.

Thanks
Scott
